mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_PRE(PRE_MEMID, PRE_BONO, PRE_TC, PRE_CATE, PRE_NAME, PRE_PRICE, PRE_CONTENT, PRE_DATE) VALUES ( #{preMemid}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAST(PRE_BONO AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1 FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_PRE) AS TEMP), #{preTc}, #{preCate}, #{preName}, #{prePrice}, #{preContent}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') )
